settings.question: What is your returns policy?
settings.answer:
If you are not 100% happy with your item, we are more than happy to facilitate a return for a full refund or store credit. Please head to our Returns Portal to start the process. All returns must be initiated within 30 days of delivery (as per your tracking information).

Any returns outside of this timeframe will not be accepted at our digression. We require all returns to be in their own original packaging, unwashed and unworn, with all tags and inclusions intact where applicable. Please read our full Returns Policy for all details.

settings.question: How do I return my item?
settings.answer:
If you need to return your item, our Returns Portal will allow this within 30 days of your delivery date. All returns are subject to the conditions outlined in our Returns Policy.

All online returns for Australia, New Zealand, United States, Canada, and United Kingdom will be provided with a shipping label for return postage. This will incur a return label fee per submission as below, which will be deducted from your final refund.

Australia: AUD$13
New Zealand: NZD$18
United States: USD$20
Canada: CAD$30
UK: GBP£18

If you have purchased from outside of these shipping regions and wish to make a return, you will need to cover the shipping costs and there will be no fee associated.

settings.question: Can I return items I purchased on sale or clearance?
settings.answer:
All items marked as clearance/in our clearance section are final sale and are not eligible for refund/exchange unless faulty.

If your item was purchase during a promotion period or with a discount code, you will be refunded the amount paid at time of purchase. This is noted in your order confirmation. The refund amount will be the price listed against the item you’ll be returning.

settings.question: Can I return items bought online to a stockist?
settings.answer: All items purchased through our website are only eligible to be returned through our returns portal and posted back to our warehouse. Our stockists cannot accept any items that have bought from our website for return/exchange instore.

settings.question: How will my order be refunded?
settings.answer: All orders must be refunded via their original payment method. We cannot be held responsible for cards that have been lost, stolen or cancelled. If the original payment method is not available, we reserve the right to issue any refund on a gift card or store credit.

settings.question: When will I get my refund?
settings.answer: Once your item is back with us and we've approved the return, we will process your refund within 48 hours. The refund can take up to 5 working days depending on the payment method you originally chose.

settings.question: Can I return something Internationally?
settings.answer:
Yes, absolutely. If you are in Australia, New Zealand, United States, Canada, or the United Kingdom, we will provide you with a returns shipping label. Simply start your return through our portal. Please note there are fees associated with returns outlined in our Refund Policy.

If you are posting to us from any other country/location outside of the above regions, returns are at the cost of the the buyer, and must be organised with your local post outlet.

settings.question: Can I exchange an item?
settings.answer:
We do not process traditional exchanges through our online store.

If you are looking to exchange for a different size or style, we recommend placing a new order for the item you would like to purchase, and returning your existing item(s) to our online warehouse for a full refund.

You can return an item via our returns portal, and view our full Returns Policy here.
